title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 
31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) (Amendment) (No. 15) 
Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 6th day of 

September 2021.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-

19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 1, by the substitution, in paragraph (2), of “9th 
day of October 2021” for “6th day of September 2021”, 

(b) by the deletion of Regulations 3A, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 and 11, 

(c) 

in Regulation 12, by the deletion of paragraph (2), and 

(d) by the substitution of the Schedule to these Regulations for 

Schedule 2 to those Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th September, 2021.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: “SCHEDULE 2

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: Nightclubs and discotheques, including those licenced under the
text_raw:
2. 

Nightclubs and discotheques, including those licenced under the 
Public Dance Halls Act 1935 (No. 2 of 1935). 

Outlets selling food or beverages whether on a retail or 
wholesale basis and whether in a non-specialised or specialised 
outlet except – 

(a) 

insofar as they sell food or beverages on a takeaway 
basis or for consumption off the premises, 

(b) 

insofar as they are staff canteens operating for the 
exclusive use of persons working in, or at, a particular 
premises, 

(c) 

(d) 

outlets that provide hotel or other accommodation 
services to guests, or 

outlets that provide food or beverages for consumption 
on a part of the premises that is wholly outdoors.”. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [452] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 September, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [452] 5

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to 
remove the regulatory restrictions and penal provisions in a number of areas. 
The Regulations remain in effect until 9th October 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [452]
